synopsis.text:
Together, an unlikely duo embarks on a journey to protect their city from the resurgence of a forbidden power that once plunged their world into chaos. Cecily Cambell, a young knight hailing from a long line of protectors, is determined to uphold her family's legacy with the treasured sword passed down from her father. However, her limited skills and experience leave her in dire straits when a crazed swordsman threatens the marketplace. Just as all hope seems lost, a mysterious blacksmith named Luke Ainsworth appears, wielding an enigmatic sword and the power to quell the chaos.

As Cecily seeks out Luke to repair her broken heirloom, their paths cross once more when a convoy is ambushed by inhuman assailants, led by an ice demon. Luke suspects the return of the demon contracts, a power banned after the devastating Valbanil War. To defend the city, he calls upon a sacred force to vanquish the foes.

Meanwhile, a shadowy figure lurks in the distance, observing the pair's growing bond and newfound strength. Who is this enigmatic evildoer, and what does his presence mean for Cecily and Luke's burgeoning alliance? As they navigate the challenges ahead, Cecily and Luke must uncover the truth behind the resurgence of the demon contracts and protect their city from the darkness that once again threatens to consume it.
